name: Within 3D - RetroFPS
description:
PROJECT ON HOLD WHILE MINI JAM 100 IS ACTIVE!

Within is a retro fps game with horror aspects to it.  You follow the main character as he heads into a foreboding castle to defeat demons from hell.  Along the way you should make sure to check every corner for hidden rooms and passages through out the castle.

Roadmap - 

Levels - 1 level currently complete, 10-20 more levels are planned.

Music - Custom music is planned on being composed

Sound Effects - No Unique sound effects for different creatures are currently made.

Creatures - Two currently exist, while one is a subclass of the other one.

Version - EasyFPS Engine will be updated to the full release as soon as possible to maximize the potential of this project.

Textures and UI - Stock textures and UI will be replaced with custom made or made from other people on this site if they fit the same art style that I am currently using for the game.

Credits - 

JessicoChan - for developing the EasyFPS Engine

Jesten - for various Texture Work

Bensmir - for the Amazing Soundtrack

If, by any chance, I forgot to mention someone's assets or tools please let me know nicely so I can properly credit them.

This game is currently in early access, anything can be changed at any time.  And please, tell me what's wrong with it so it can be changed. Do you want to support me and this project?

Then Buy Me A Coffee!
